metadata.title: CVE-2019-11751 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Logging-related command line parameters are not properly sanitized whenFirefox is launched by another program, such as when a user clicks onmalicious links in a chat application. This can be used to write a log fileto an arbitrary location such as the Windows 'Startup' folder.
*Note:this issue only affects Firefox on Windows operating systems.*. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 69 and Firefox ESR < 68.1.

criterions.comment: mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
